trans-unit.source: Stores an ordered pair of integers, which specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>.
trans-unit.target: 将存储的整数，指定的有序的对<> *1> 和<> *1>。

trans-unit.source: The Size class is used to specify a height and width through the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A> property for <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> and other graphics classes.
trans-unit.target: 大小类用于指定高度和宽度通过<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A>属性<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>， <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>， <xref:System.Drawing.Image>，<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>和其他图形类。</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can perform operations on a Size by using the overloaded operators such as <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用重载的运算符，如执行在大小上的操作<xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>。</xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the Size structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: 单位<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>大小的结构取决于<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A>设置<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>用于绘制的对象。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 返回此哈希代码<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: You should avoid depending on GetHashCode for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Size> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: 你应避免具体取决于 GetHashCode 唯一值，作为两个<xref:System.Drawing.Size>的相同值的对象及其<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>属性可能会返回相同的哈希代码。</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: This behavior could change in a future release.
